import { {{EntityName}}, {{EntityName}}Repository, IGet{{EntityName}}s } from '../../Domain';
import { IPaginationResponse, IUseCase } from '@server/Application';

export class Get{{EntityName}}s implements IUseCase<IPaginationResponse<{{EntityName}}[]>> {
  constructor(private {{entityName}}sRepository: {{EntityName}}Repository) {}

  async execute({
    input,
    requestContext,
  }: IGet{{EntityName}}s): Promise<IPaginationResponse<{{EntityName}}[]>> {
    return this.{{entityName}}sRepository.get{{EntityName}}s({
      filters: input,
      requestContext,
    });
  }
}
